code: import{prueba}from"./ProductFormat";export function searchDataProducts(){if(!localStorage["products"]){localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(prueba);}let products=localStorage["products"];products=JSON.parse(products);return products;}export function removeDataProduct(remove){let products=searchDataProducts();products=products.filter(product=>product.id!==remove);localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(products);}export function editDataProduct(edit){let products=searchDataProducts();products=products.filter(product=>product.id!==edit.id);products.push(edit);localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(products);}export function saveDataProduct(product){let products=searchDataProducts();products.push(product);localStorage["products"]=JSON.stringify(products);return true;}export function reloadDataProducts(){localStorage.removeItem("products");return searchDataProducts();}
